Identity.Name: Syra, Akaedyn Shikari
Identity.Basic_Description: Human in silver light armor with robotic arm and a large 'elepahnt' rifle slung over shoulder on the other arm

Abilities.Name: Grappling Hook
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, Syra can choose any location in line of site within 10 range and move to it.

Abilities.Name: Big Game Hunter
Abilities.Ability: When attacking a target larger than medium size, Syra gains +2 skill.
